document.discussion_title: Hamster version of 'Super Mario' takes cute to the next level
document.topic_text: Everything is better with hamsters. One cute, furry creature runs through a man-made Nintendo paradise, trying to score as many points as it can until it reaches the castle. The only thing that would make Hamster Mario even cuter would be a tiny mustache. Koko the gorilla jams out on bass with Flea from Red Hot Chili ... »
